</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Close the currently active user dialog with exit code. Most common exit codes are:
<code>#define IDC_OK            1 //emulate "Ok" button</code>
<code>#define IDC_CANCEL        2 //emulate "Cancel" button</code></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''closeDialog''' exitcode </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> exitcode : [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>#define IDC_CANCEL 2
[[closeDialog]] IDC_CANCEL;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
